spatial_accuracy.notes: Kitchen-left / living-right / bath-center / stairs-left broadly match the 2D plan, but key spatial relationships diverge: the 3D render introduces a long interior partition creating a corridor and separating dining from living, whereas the plan shows dining + living as one open area (no separating wall). Entrance placement and circulation do not match the plan’s bottom-center entry. Multiple door and window positions on exterior walls do not correspond to the marked openings in the 2D plan. Room proportions are distorted (living room appears less elongated than the 13' x 24' plan dimension; dining zone appears oversized/reshaped).

structural_fidelity.notes: Exterior shell is roughly consistent, but internal wall layout is not faithful: a hallucinated divider/corridor changes adjacency (dining not open to living as in plan). Stair geometry does not match the plan’s stair configuration/footprint. Doors are generally embedded, but several are placed on the wrong walls/locations (including an exterior door near dining that does not match the plan’s shown opening type). No major labeled room is entirely missing, but the plan’s intended open-plan relationship is structurally violated and some plan openings are omitted.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture types align at a high level (kitchen cabinetry/appliances in kitchen zone; dining table in dining zone; sofa/coffee table in living zone). However, due to altered room boundaries and proportions, furniture positioning relative to walls/openings is not faithful, and scale reads inconsistent with the tighter plan (living seating area appears too spacious vs the plan’s depth).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good isometric presentation with clean, readable geometry and coherent lighting. Minor issues: window/door representations are stylized and do not clearly encode exact plan openings; some exterior opening markers read like decals rather than true windows, reducing architectural clarity.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated long interior wall/partition forming a corridor and separating dining from living; 2D plan indicates dining + living are open (no separating wall).
Entrance placement/circulation is inconsistent: plan shows main entrance at bottom-center; 3D render places the entry/stoop toward the bottom-left side.
Missing/incorrect opening type on the top-right (dining side): plan indicates a wider/double-door opening; 3D shows a single door.
Window placement mismatch: several exterior windows shown in the 2D plan (notably along the bottom and right edges) are not represented at matching locations/sizes in the 3D render.
Room proportion distortion: living room does not preserve the elongated 13' x 24' feel; dining/kitchen zones appear re-proportioned relative to the plan.
Stair footprint/configuration distortion: 3D stair run does not match the plan’s stair layout/shape and enclosure geometry.
Interior door orientation/placement around the bathroom differs from the plan (door locations and swing/orientation do not correspond to the 2D layout).
